name: Happy Piggy Farm
description:
You are a happy pig in the farm. Everyday the town folks will eat the fattest and thinnest pig in the farm. Try to survive as long as you can!

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move. Eating will make you fatter and moving helps you lose weight. A new ending will be unlocked if you survive until the end once.

Background musics and sound effects are from the following Unity Assets:

  • Ultimate Game Music Collection
  • Ultimate SFX Bundle - HD Remaster
  • Universal Sound FX
  • Interface and Item Sounds

Thank you for playing the game!
